CustomField.description: # of business days between Last Activity and today
CustomField.formula: (5 * ( FLOOR( ( TODAY() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( TODAY() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( LastActivityDate - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD(LastActivityDate - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: this field counts the number of business days between last activity and today
CustomField.label: Last Activity Age
